import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Stack, Text, Container, Box, Accordion, Radio, Group, Center, ColorInput, Slider, Input, Button, } from "@mantine/core"; import { Dropzone, IMAGE_MIME_TYPE } from '@mantine/dropzone'; import { IconCircleXFilled, IconAlignLeft, IconAlignCenter, IconAlignJustified, IconAlignRight, IconAdjustmentsHorizontal, IconPhoto, } from "@tabler/icons-react"; import classes from '../css/Dropzone.module.css'; const ImageTest = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState(1); const handleChange = (newValue) => { setValue(newValue); }; const handleIncrement = () => { const newValue = value + 1; if (newValue <= 100) { setValue(newValue); } }; return ( Image
Image {}} accept={IMAGE_MIME_TYPE} // className={classes.root} bg="white" h="5rem" w="12rem" ml="5rem" > Select Image Hight Width Alignment Boxfit Background Color Back Button Radious Top Left Padding Left Margin ); }; export default ImageTest;
